TopicTitle: Contracts not showing up anymore in career mode

Articles.Content:
I've been trying to replay career mode, but the contracts won't show up anymore, and i don't know wich mod is the one to cause the issue.

here's a screenshot of my Gamedata folder:

Update: Solved! it turned out to be a badly installed texturereplacer.

Edited May 24, 2015 by MK3424
I'm having the same problem, but don't have TextureReplacer. Any idea what about TextureReplacer did it? I'm having the same issue
iam -1 now.Coz i delete alternative start without pods.
